traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The silid’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 9, +1 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast blur once per day, requiring no material components.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the silid surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
